metrics_conclusion: For Whom the Knell Tolls has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Chord Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: For Whom the Knell Tolls has sections analyzed in the following keys: G♯ Minor,  and G♯ Dorian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
